template.name: Base Specification Template
template.description: Foundation template for creating detailed specifications with user stories and acceptance criteria

sections.name: Overview
sections.description: High-level description of the feature or functionality

sections.name: Acceptance Criteria
sections.description: Detailed, testable criteria using EARS format

placeholders.name: feature_name
placeholders.description: Name of the feature being specified

placeholders.name: user_role
placeholders.description: Primary user role for the feature

placeholders.name: acceptance_criteria
placeholders.description: Specific, testable criteria in EARS format
placeholders.example: WHEN user enters valid credentials THEN system SHALL authenticate within 2 seconds

rules.message: Specification must include User Stories section
Specification must include Acceptance Criteria section
Acceptance criteria should use EARS format (WHEN...THEN...SHALL)
Feature name placeholder must be replaced
Requirements should be referenced in format '_Requirements: X.X_'

usage.instructions: This template provides the foundation for all specifications. Replace placeholders with specific content, ensure all required sections are completed, and follow EARS format for acceptance criteria.

examples.description: Creating a spec for a completely new feature from scratch
Specifying improvements to an existing feature
Detailed specification for complex bug fixes

prerequisites: Familiarity with EARS acceptance criteria syntax
